name: factorfakenews
0:
”Alexa open fact or fake news”
”start a quiz with two players”
”we are three players”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fact or fake news
des:
Get smarter having fun! You're told statments about all US presidents and have to say if it's fact or fake news! After your answer you'll usually be given additional information about the factum behind the statement. 

You can compete with up to three of your friends or family members:
> If you play alone or with two players, each player gets seven statements. 
> If you play with three or four players, each player gets five statements. 

Curious? Great! Just try the game and have fun!

** Bug fix: We fixed the problem with the skill's respond time out **
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
